pl.mbdev.dirrdiff

Class DirScanThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • pl.mbdev.util.MonitoredThread
        • pl.mbdev.dirrdiff.DirScanThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public final class DirScanThread
extends pl.mbdev.util.MonitoredThread
    Thread that scans the all directories under a given root directory, listing all the files it contains.

    File creation date: Jul 28, 2012, 6:47:05 PM. This is a part of DirrDiff.
